Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui

Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.expertCards.deck

package it.polimi.ingsw.model.expertCards.deck
  • Related Packages

    it.polimi.ingsw.model.expertCards
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ColorInfluenceCard
    Expert card n.9, that enables the calculus of influence without considering the students of a specific color
    DenyCard
    Expert card n.5, that enables the placement of a deny token on an island to prevent the influence calculus
    HallBagSwapCard
    Expert card n.12, that forces every player to put back in the bag three students of a specific color from their ingress
    IngressCardSwapCard
    Expert card n.7, that enables to swap up to three students from this card with students on the ingress of a player
    IngressHallSwapCard
    Expert card n.10, that enables a player to swap up to two students between his ingress and hall
    IslandInfluenceCard
    Expert card n.3, that triggers the immediate influence calculus on an island choose by the player
    ProfessorControlCard
    Expert card n.2, that enables a player to gain control of a professor if the owner of the professor has the same students as him
    StudentToHallCard
    Expert card n.11, that enables a player to transfer a student from this card to his hall
    StudentToIslandCard
    Expert card n.1, that enables a player to transfer a student from this card to an island
    TowerInfluenceCard
    Expert card n.6, that enables the calculus of influence without considering the towers present on the island
    TwoInfluenceCard
    Expert card n.8, that grants to a player two additional points in the influence calculus
    TwoJumpCard
    Expert card n.4, that enables a player to make move mother nature up to two islands more
